text: An international tsunami evacuation drill with the participation of 29 countries with tsunami risk in the Indian Ocean will be held on 07th of this month at Brahmanawatta North Grama Niladhari Division in Balapitiya Divisional Secretary Division in Galle District.It is planned to be held from 9-10 am. Balapitiya Revatha Vidyalaya and Sri Darshanaramaya will be its modal security centres. The programme is organized by the Disaster Management Unit of Galle District.
title: Tsunami evacuation drill
